msg.msgText: "{0}" is a singleton configuration object. Use "imaserver {1}" option(s).

msgExplanation.p: The object type or configuration item is not valid for 'imaserver create' or 'imaserver update' command.

msgUserResponse.p: Run 'imaserver set help' and 'imaserver create help' or 'imaserver update help' command and ensure that proper object_type and required configuration items are specified. Also check for mis-matched double quotes.
